products.name: La Lagartija
products.description: Mysterious and treacherous... The best choice for the start of your journey! It will provide you a rich, delicious flavor.

products.name: El Tigre
products.description: Really dark coffee, only for the real gourmet. It has bitter flavor of grapefruits and is mixed with a little bit of peanuts with caramel.

products.name: La Cucaracha
products.description: Sweet and intense with a rich amount of different flavors. Caramel, grapes, strawberry... you name it!
